#summary Use case for updating a HTML Template.
#labels Phase-Design,UseCase

= Introduction =

*Description:*

Updates the content of a HTML Template in the database.

*Preconditions:*
 # The user has the role of Administrator.
 # The user is logged into the administration interface.
 # The user is viewing the Update Template page for the template he wants to edit.

*Postconditions:*
 # The selected template will be updated with the changed HTML markup content.

= Basic Course of Action =

 # User wants to update the content of a HTML Template.
 # User makes changes to the existing HTML markup.
 # User submits the form.
 # The system verifies that the template exists in the database.
 # The system updates the template content in the database.
 # The system deletes the cache file for the template.
 # The system displays a success page to the user.
 # Use case ends.
